text: that’s right <@U0Z41KY5V>  so “endorser” and “committer” are possible roles of a Peer. an endorser Peer must also be a committer Peer, because an endorser needs access to the ledger and state, which are maintained by the committer. on the other hand, a committer Peer doesn’t have to be an endorser.
as far as the SDK design goes, it’d be more clear to the application developer in my opinion if we call out the “endorser Peer” and “committer Peer” separately
because for submitting Proposals you need to contact the “endorser Peer”. and for listening to events, you need to be connected with the “committer Peer"
although, this doesn’t mean we need to call “committer Peer” by that name, it’ll be easier to understand if we call it “event source Peer” or something of that nature
